DOC.brief_summary: In prospective , cross-sectional study , aim investigate possible role cord stress hormone ; adrenocorticotropic hormone ( ACTH ) , cortisol , epinephrine , sT3 , sT4 , thyroid-stimulating hormone ( TSH ) development Transient Tachypnea Newborn ( TTN ) , via modulatory effect epithelial sodium channel Na-K-ATPase .
DOC.brief_title: Role Cord Blood Hormones Epinephrine Development Transient Tachypnea Newborn
DOC.criteria: Gestation age > 34 week C/S deliver infant Parental consent form sign Gestation age < 34 week Maternal condition compromise fetal wellbeing ( hypertensive disorder , diabetes , chorioamnionitis ) Intrauterine growth retardation Congenital malformation Absence parental consent
